title: bad RAM?
body: <!-- id=175--><!-- isMature=0 -->this computer (my server), has been rebooting at random times.  it just restarted itself 7 times in a row.  i'm guessing its bad RAM, but what the hell do i know.  Basically if you can't read this, try again later ;-)
bodyArticleHtml:
2003-06-11

bad RAM?

this computer (my server), has been rebooting at random times. it just restarted itself 7 times in a row. i'm guessing its bad RAM, but what the hell do i know. Basically if you can't read this, try again later ;-)
